name: Cards and Paddles
description:
CARDS AND PADDLES

A sugary themed pinball machine with a twist.

Choose from a selection of cards that affect either your ball, the pinball machine, or the boss directly. Find the perfect combination to beat the boss as quickly and efficiently as possible. Create a winning streak to gain more cards or fail and start from the beginning.
